projectDescription: Interactive strategy creation tool for Valorant players with map drawing, line-ups, and local strategy management.
keyFeatures: Interactive map drawing and annotations with multiple tools (lines, free drawing, arrows)
Agent positioning and ability placement for all Valorant agents
Multi-page strategy support with page transitions and animations
Local file storage using Hive database with folder organization
Strategy export/import with .ica file format supporting images and metadata
Line-up creation tool for ability placement and positioning
Custom image and text annotations on maps
Attack/defense side configuration per strategy page
Strategy versioning and automatic migration system
Desktop-focused UX with keyboard shortcuts and custom cursors
publicApiSurface: StrategyProvider - Core strategy workflow coordination and CRUD operations
StrategyData - Main data model for strategies with pages, map data, and metadata
StrategyPage - Individual page within a strategy with drawing and placement data
DrawingProvider - Manages drawing elements (lines, free drawing, arrows)
AgentProvider - Handles Valorant agent placement and management
AbilityProvider - Manages ability placements and attachments
MapProvider - Controls map selection and attack/defense modes
FolderProvider - Manages folder hierarchy and organization
TextProvider - Handles text annotations on maps
LineUpProvider - Coordinates line-up creation and management
File format: .ica (ZIP archive with JSON + images)
Export/Import API for strategies and folders
Migration system for legacy strategy formats
